entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Here is one of the answers you did not want to answer!
Did you get a letter from a MARK GRENON? Yes or No!

“Mark Grenon wrote to Trump saying chlorine dioxide ‘can rid the body of Covid-19’ days before the president promoted disinfectant as treatment”.

https://t.co/SB2uA9JZ7P
